snippet: Nearly 14 years after their first meeting as professionals, Rafael Nadal maintained order by beating Spanish countryman Albert Montanes 6-2, 6-2 to make the Barcelona Open quarterfinals on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Nearly 14 years after their first meeting as professionals, Rafael Nadal maintained order by beating Spanish countryman Albert Montanes 6-2, 6-2 to make the Barcelona Open quarterfinals on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Beats Montanes to Reach Barcelona Open Quarterfinals
headline.main: Nadal Beats Montanes to Reach Barcelona Open Quarterfinals
